3.name: Villager
3.text: "Over here! The dragon is in the square! Hurry!"

4.name: Eni-sensei
4.text: "In the square...? The dragon is coming?"

5.name: Villager
5.text:
"Yes... it seems like it's injured... It's not
rampaging, and it doesn't seem to be moving at
all..."

6.name: Villager
6.text:
"We don't know what to do... That's why we have to
ask Eni-sensei, the best adventurer in the
neighborhood..."

7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"I'm not the best in the town. Anyway, I
understand the situation. Let's do something about
it. Everyone, please stay away."

10.name: Narration
10.text:
In the village square, a gigantic dragon covered
in shining golden scales lay. Its body, reflecting
the light of torches, was heavily stained with
blood, and it trembled weakly in the face of
death's jaws.

12.name: Eni-sensei
12.text:
"Gold Dragon...! Judging from its body... it's
probably in its young adult stage. ...It's a fatal
wound, isn't it? It won't last much longer..."

13.name: Villager
13.text: "I-Is... is it going to be okay...?"

14.name: Eni-sensei
14.text:
"Gold dragons are mostly of good alignment and
follow the laws of order. They do not eat people.
Probably."

15.name: Villager
15.text: "P-Perhaps... Is it safe to approach, sensei!?"

17.name: Eni-sensei
17.text:
"ウク・シェー・イー・ダラトリウン・ズィア？ケン？  (What happened? Is
there anything I can help with?)"

19.name: Narration
19.text:
The golden dragon, whose consciousness had become
slightly clearer upon hearing fluent dragon
language, weakly looked at the female adventurer
referred to as "sensei."

21.name: Kinryu
21.text:
"Our friend, the small one, a human child... Could
you please take on our final request in this
life?"

23.name: Kinryu
23.text:
"I fought against the red dragon that sought to
take our nest, but I was defeated... However, I
wanted to save this child... I somehow managed to
bring it to the human village..."

25.name: Eni-sensei
25.text:
"An egg...! A dragon's egg, is it...? In order to
protect this child..."

26.name: Kinryu
26.text:
"Please... please, could you take care of this
child... This child is my only regret... I can no
longer entrust it to you, anymore..."

28.name: Eni-sensei
28.text:
"Understood. I will take responsibility for your
child. I swear upon my name, Enitouraya, and my
sword."

30.name: Eni-sensei
30.text:
"So please, rest assured and have a peaceful
sleep."

32.name: Kinryu
32.text:
"I am grateful... Please... take care of that
child..."

37.name: Narration
37.text:
The female adventurer offers a silent prayer for
the dragon's remains. Seeing this, the surrounding
villagers also hurriedly follow suit.

39.name: Villager
39.text: "Um, so... what exactly is happening here...?"

40.name: Eni-sensei
40.text:
"It seems that... this Kinryu was attacked by an
evil red dragon in its nest, and despite being on
the brink of death, it managed to escape and
arrive at this village. It wanted to entrust its
child... even if just the egg... to someone."

41.name: Villager
41.text:
"I see... So, sensei, you're also fluent in dragon
language...? Wait, sensei!? Did you by any chance
agree to take care of it!?"

42.name: Eni-sensei
42.text:
"I am not a woman who cannot read the air enough
to disregard the final wish in this situation."

43.name: Eni-sensei
43.text:
"A proud Kinryu, on the verge of death, asked for
help from a human... and even entrusted its child.
It's not something I can refuse, after all."

44.name: Villager
44.text:
"Well, it's certainly like you, sensei... But, um,
do you have any experience raising dragons,
sensei?"

45.name: Eni-sensei
45.text:
"There's no way I have any experience. I haven't
even given birth to my own child, let alone still
being unmarried."

46.name: Eni-sensei
46.text:
"However, I made a promise. Even though I am
called a sage in some way, I must not bring shame
to that name. I will somehow manage to fulfill
it."

47.name: Eni-sensei
47.text:
"There is something I would like everyone to help
with. Please, I ask for your cooperation."

49.name: Villager
49.text:
"Well... if it's a request from sensei, I can't
refuse." "We don't even know how many times she
has saved the village." "If we can repay even a
little bit of the favor, I'm happy to help."

50.name: Eni-sensei
50.text:
"Thank you very much. ...And, right now it's just
my intuition, but... perhaps, there is a
possibility that this egg may become the savior of
the village──────"
